name: Overwatch 2: Watchpoint Pack
description:
Gear up for Overwatch® 2 with the Watchpoint Pack!

The pack includes the following Overwatch® 2 in-game content: Season One Premium Battle Pass, 7 Legendary skins (including 2 all-new Space Raider skins), 5 Epic skins, 2,000 Overwatch® Coins and instant access to all 35 Overwatch Heroes.*

With the Season One Premium Battle Pass you can unlock over 80 Tiers of rewards including Mythic Cyber Demon Genji, Legendary Hinotori Kiriko, and more. In addition, as a Season One Premium Battle Pass owner you will automatically receive access to Overwatch’s latest hero, Kiriko!*

*Instant Access to all 35 heroes and the Season 1 Battle Pass subject to logging in to Overwatch 2 during Season 1. Provides the Season 1 Battle Pass and instant access to all 35 heroes that are available for Season 1 and will not award access to heroes, Battle Passes or seasonal/live content introduced after Season 1.
